text: Wixia is a genus of South American orb-weaver spiders first described by O. Pickard-Cambridge in 1882, containing the single species, Wixia abdominalis. There used to be many more, but they have all been moved, dispersed between Ocrepeira, Alpaida, and several other genera. ==References== Category:Araneidae Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of South America
title: Wixia
